resources.title: A List Apart
resources.description: Explores the design, development, and meaning of web content, with a special focus on web standards and best practices.

resources.title: Smashing Magazine
resources.description: An online magazine for professional web designers and developers, with a focus on useful techniques, best practices, and valuable resources.

resources.title: Behance
resources.description: A platform to showcase and discover creative work, featuring a variety of design projects and portfolios.

books.title: Design of Everyday Things
books.description: A classic book on design by Don Norman.

books.title: Don't Make Me Think
books.description: A common sense approach to web usability by Steve Krug.

books.title: Hooked: How to Build Habit-Forming Products
books.description: A guide to creating products that people love by Nir Eyal.
